content.rendered:
Discover Smooth Confidence with Expert Waxing at York Street Spa

At York Street Spa, we understand the importance of smooth, hair-free skin when it comes to feeling confident and ready to take on the world. Our expert waxing services offer you a convenient and effective way to achieve that silky-smooth look, leaving you feeling your best every day.

Whether you’re looking for precise facial waxing, upper body grooming, or lower body hair removal, our skilled estheticians are here to ensure a comfortable and professional experience. Say goodbye to the hassle of frequent shaving and hello to long-lasting smoothness with our range of waxing options.

Explore our waxing menu, and let us help you reveal your most confident and radiant self. Book your waxing appointment at York Street Spa today and discover the beauty of smooth confidence.

Face

Brow Maintenance

$30

$65

$84

BRAZILIAN MAINTENANCE:

$69

UPPER LEG:

$60

LOWER LEG:

$55

FULL LEG & BIKINI:

$105

FULL LEG & BRAZILIAN:

$135

TOES:

$20

At York Street Spa, our waxing services are designed to provide you with a comfortable and effective hair removal experience. Say goodbye to razors and hello to long-lasting smoothness.

Book your waxing appointment today and step into a world of confidence and convenience.
